transport.question: I go beep beep! I take you places! What am I?

hints.text: 🚦 I have wheels!
👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 Many people can ride in me.
🚗 I am driven on the road.

transport.question: I go choo choo! I ride on a track! What am I?

hints.text: 🚂 I am very long.
💨 I can make a lot of noise!
🚝 I carry many people and things.

transport.question: I float on water! I can be big or small! What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I help people cross the water.
⚓ I might have a flag.
🛥️ I don't fly, but I travel on water.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you pedal with your feet! What am I?

hints.text: 👧 You can ride me!
🔔 I might have a bell!
🚴 I am good exercise.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people far away! What am I?

hints.text: ✈️ I have wings.
☁️ I fly above the clouds.
🌎 I can take you to different countries.

transport.question: I’m big and yellow, and take kids to school! What am I?

hints.text: 🚦 I have flashing lights.
🛑 I stop to pick up children.
🏫 I am a School ____

transport.question: I help people who are hurt, and I go very fast! What am I?

hints.text: 🚨 I have a siren.
🚑 I take people to the hospital.
🤕 People use me when they have an emergency.

transport.question: I zoom through space and explore new worlds! What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I fly high above the earth.
👨‍🚀 Astronauts travel in me.
✨ I travel to the moon and the stars.

transport.question: I have a basket and you push me at the store! What am I?

hints.text: 🛒 You put groceries in me.
🍎 You use me when shopping for food.
💰 Mommies push them around supermarkets.

transport.question: I help firefighters put out fires! What am I?

hints.text: 🚒 I am red and shiny.
💦 I have a big hose.
🔥 Firefighters drive me.

plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Sometimes cows eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I grow outside.
🐄 Animals like to eat me.
💚 I am the color of a frog!

plant.question: I am big and strong, and I have leaves. Birds like to sit in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I am very tall.
🐿️ Squirrels like to climb on me.
🍂 My leaves fall off in the autumn.

plant.question: I am pretty and colorful, and bees like me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 I smell nice.
🐝 I help bees make honey.
🌈 I can be red, yellow, or pink!

plant.question: I am long and orange, and you can eat me. Rabbits love me! What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a vegetable.
🐰 Bunnies love to eat me.
👩‍🌾 I grow in the ground and farmers pick me.

plant.question: I have a stem and leaves, and I need water to grow. What am I?

hints.text: 🪴 You can grow me in a pot.
🌧️ I need water to live.
☀️ I grow towards the sun.

plant.question: I am round and juicy, and I grow on a vine. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I am a small, round fruit.
🐒 Monkeys like to eat me.
💜 I am often purple, green or red.

plant.question: I am a seed that pops into fluffy food when it gets hot. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 You eat me at the movies!
🌽 I start as a yellow kernel.
🔥 Heat makes me go 'pop'!

plant.question: I am a hard seed inside a shell. Squirrels bury me for winter. What am I?

hints.text: 🌰 I come from a tree.
🐿️ Squirrels hide me to eat later.
🍂 I fall to the ground in autumn

plant.question: I am a tall plant with a thick stem. You can cut me to make paper. What am I?

hints.text: 🎋 Pandas like to eat me.
📜 I am used to make paper.
🌱 I grow very fast and tall.

plant.question: I am a plant with thorns and a beautiful smell. People give me to someone they love. What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 I am a type of flower.
💌 People give me as a gift for Valentine's Day.
🥀 I can be red, pink, or white.
